meanings.definition: A female Egyptian dancer or singer.
meanings.sent1: The talented almahs captivated the audience with her graceful movements.
meanings.sent2: The almahs performed a traditional dance at the cultural festival.
meanings.sent3: The almahs accidentally tripped over her own veil during the performance, causing a moment of laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a mesmerizing almahs, enchanting all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of her costume made her look like a mystical almahs from a fairy tale.

meanings.sent1: The market was bustling with almehs selling their handmade crafts.
meanings.sent2: Tourists were fascinated by the exotic beauty of the almehs in the marketplace.
meanings.sent3: The almehs decided to have a friendly competition to see who could sell the most souvenirs.
meanings.sent4: The alley was filled with the chatter of the almehs, creating a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of spices mingled with the laughter of the almehs, creating a unique sensory experience.
